Title: How to manage Personal Access Tokens with Azure DevOps panel
Description: Managing personal access tokens (PATs) can be difficult and time-consuming because they are long strings of characters that are hard to memorize or keep track of. Azure DevOps has made this process much easier with their Personal Access Token Management panel. This tutorial will go through the process of how to find and manage PATs in the Azure DevOps Management app.

Title: Twitter, could you please fix your image servers?
Description:
For anyone who knows me, it’s no surprise that I’m horribly addicted to Twitter. I joined back in 20091 and I’ve fallen into more technical rabbit holes than I care to.
As a Twitter user who is Very Online, I love to theorise about why services go wrong and poke fun at corporations but as an SRE myself, I find it very difficult to direct blame at people.
To be clear, I’ll be talking about Twitter in the brand/persona sense and not as a reflection of the many people who I’m sure work tirelessly behind the scenes.

Title: Akamai and Micro-Segmentation   :: Procella Technologies —
Description:
Today is an exciting day for Procella as Akamai has announced that it will be adding Guardicore’s micro-segmentation technology to its growing Zero Trust product portfolio. We strongly believe that micro-segmentation is a key component of a comprehensive Zero Trust (ZT) strategy and are thrilled that Akamai (and Procella) customers will be able to leverage Guardicore’s microseg solution as part of a holistic ZT architecture.
We have known the Guardicore team for several years now and we are really looking forward to working with them as part of our expanded Akamai-based portfolio.
